availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: R. J. Meyler (Bullitt County, Kentucky, attorney and circuit clerk)

body.p: Bullitt County, Kentucky, attorney and circuit clerk. Pennsylvania native. Clerk of the Bullitt Circuit Court in Bullitt County in 1864. Attorney in Bullitt County in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Internal Revenue Assessment Lists for Kentucky, 1862-1866 NARA RG 58, Microfilm Series M768, Roll 7, Bullitt County, Kentucky, 1865, p. 82 (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bullitt County, Shepherdsville, p. 4.
“Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1863,” in 1864 Kentucky Documents, Legislative Document No. 10. (Frankfort, Ky.: Wm. E. Hughes, State Printer, 1864), 301-306.
